basics.name: Joe Maddalone
basics.label: Lead Front End Developer at Genos
basics.summary: I am an accomplished web developer able to work in various environments and adapt to new processes quickly. I have extensive experience coordinating large projects with multiple teams, handholding through decision making with small startups, and managing to make my own ‘weekend projects’ profitable. I've taught thousands of developers the skills they need to advance their careers. I'm a father of five, I've founded companies, invented services, led teams, and guided products. However, I have not yet had the pleasure of working with you.

work.summary: Developed multiple websites and a central custom CMS using Angular and ASP.NET.  Developed various internal and public facing tools using a wide variety of technologies.

Currently developing applications and managing participants for 20+ fortune 500 companies.Primary applications developer, Website UI and DBA for over 300,000 users across various companies. including HoribaABX, Intercall, Gold Violin, Goldman Promotions, Acco Brands, Sysco Foods, US Foods and more.  Developed custom encryption software as well as various gateway applications between clients, distributors and marketing teams.

Developed the early form and paper filing systems for all sales, scheduling, and customer management.  Later developed web-based software to replace the paper systems based on my original implementations.

Leading a team of senior developers.Transitioning several large JavaScript projects to ES6/ES7 technologies while not impeding feature development.Implementing architecture, features, best practices, and testing.Responsible for demonstrating progress and features to an executive team.Heavily involved in engineering decisions, sprint planning, task assignment, and feature prioritization.
Development focused on making really cool things work in a browser. Really. Cool. Things.
Creating screencasts covering various JavaScript technologies with a focus on AngularJS and React.
Primary Web Developer and ongoing enhancements and technical support for triedandtruth.com.

Developed multi-tiered order processing systems.  Customer Service Management Systems.  Custom acccounting software.  Website development and all metrics. Developed systems integrating Paypal API, EDI x12, eBay API, Abe Books API, Google Products Search, WIndows Live Product Search, Amazon Ecommerce Services and more.

Managed all aspects of website including promotional events and internet broadcasting (2000-2004).Designed presentations, authored and produced promotional DVDs and flash presentions, managed all graphic design and printing.Developed online advertising revenue structure as well as full CMS for staff use.
